remarks:
Omega is a limit ordinal.  Theorem 2.8 of [BellMachover] p. 473.  Our proof, however, does not require the Axiom of Infinity.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Mar-1995.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2015.)
